title: Steam dragon hide
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Name                                                           | Steam dragon hide |
| :------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- |
| Size to wear                                                   | Any               |
| [Armour Class](/Armour_class "Armour class")                   | 2                 |
| [Encumbrance rating](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating") | +0                |
| Maximum Enchantment                                            | +0                |
| Grants                                                         | rSteam++          |
| Time to Wear                                                   | 5                 |

|   |                                                                                                         |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The soft and supple scaly skin of a steam dragon. It may be turned into proper armour by magical means. |

A **steam dragon hide** isn't a particularily impressive armour... In fact, it's almost the same as a lowly [robe](/Robe "Robe"). However, it does provide two ranks of [steam](/Steam "Steam") resistance, and can be enchanted with a [scroll of enchant armour](/Scroll_of_enchant_armour "Scroll of enchant armour") to turn it into a much more desirable [steam dragon armour](/Steam_dragon_armour "Steam dragon armour").

You may find one after butchering a [steam dragon](/Steam_dragon "Steam dragon") corpse.

## History

Steam dragon hides were removed in [0.19](/0.19 "0.19").

html:
Steam dragon hide

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Name Steam dragon hide
Size to wear Any
Armour Class 2
Encumbrance rating +0
Maximum Enchantment +0
Grants rSteam++
Time to Wear 5


The soft and supple scaly skin of a steam dragon. It may be turned into proper armour by magical means.

A steam dragon hide isn't a particularily impressive armour... In fact, it's almost the same as a lowly robe. However, it does provide two ranks of steam resistance, and can be enchanted with a scroll of enchant armour to turn it into a much more desirable steam dragon armour.

You may find one after butchering a steam dragon corpse.

History

Steam dragon hides were removed in 0.19.

A '''steam dragon hide''' isn't a particularily impressive armour... In fact, it's almost the same as a lowly [[robe]]. However, it does provide two ranks of [[steam]] resistance, and can be enchanted with a [[scroll of enchant armour]] to turn it into a much more desirable [[steam dragon armour]].

You may find one after butchering a [[steam dragon]] corpse.

==History==
Steam dragon hides were removed in [[0.19]].
